title: What is the biggest snub in the 2019 MNET Asian Music Award (2019 MAMA) nomination? - Quora

response.answer_text: Uh, I think there were a few. Blackpink got NOTHING. I was told it was because since they couldn’t attend they get zero awards (dumb in my opinion). They are in Japan doing a string of concerts. So naturally unable to attend. But they were nominated quite a lot. Two categories I felt pretty strongly about where the award ended up going. Don’t get me wrong. I get it. K-Pop Idols work their butts off. Each and every one of them give their all and they all 100% deserve recognition for efforts. However, I was displeased with Best New Male Artist: Winner: TXT. Who I believe SHOULD have won: Ateez. I ADORE TXT but I think that Ateez just has that something MORE that TXT is still missing. It’s hard to explain. And Best Dance Performance - Male Group: Winner: BTS. Who I believe SHOULD have won: Literally any other group nominated in that category (Got7 “Eclipse”, EXO “Tempo”, NU’EST “Bet Bet”, Monsta X “Alligator”, and Seventeen “Fear”). Boy with Luv was 100% a bop but it did not have great choreo.
